title: A Flag on the Play
itunes:title: A Flag on the Play
description:
Charlamagne gives his opinion on Cam Newton’s controversial statements about women on the Million Dollaz Worth of Game podcast in this bonus episode of Tha God's Honest Truth. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
